thread.section_title: Sportsmemorabilia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Sportsmemorabilia | www.sportsmemorabilia.com
thread.title: Bradley Mullaney

author: Bradley Mullaney
title: Bradley Mullaney
text: When I ordered and the reviewed the shipping after the email was sent to me, I noticed that the ship date was going to make difficult to get the order in time. It is a present for a good friend. I called and spoke to Andrea Mendoza and told me she would check on it, see if she could a rush on it and get back to me. She got back to me pretty quickly letting me know it was rushed through, has been shipped and will be here in time. It is nice to know there is still good customer service out there. Thanks Andrea!
